comments:
In M9 I often (but not always) get an exception during refactor...extract
constant. For example in the code part

public DPADSendLog(IClient client) {
	super(client.getInstallPath()+File.separator+"sendlog.log");
}

I highlight the part
File.separator+"sendlog.log"
and try to extract that as constant.

Exception stack trace is:
